reviewText: For anyone who is interested in the mob this is a must. This detailed documentary charts the rise and fall of the mob in Las Vegas from the early days of Bugsy Siegal and the 'Flamingo' hotel to Frank 'Lefty' Rosenthal, Tony Spilitro, Geri Rosenthal an the 'Stardust' hotel as deplicted in the film and book 'Casino'. The TRUE story of Paradise on Earth and the wiseguys who lost it all.
